location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a dispute between Captain Clements and an unnamed Karack [Bandar-e ChƒÅrak] pilot. The dispute centres around the captain's refusal to pay pilotage charges, and his punishment of the aforementioned pilot by discharging him at Bussora [Basra]. The details and possible implications of the dispute are outlined in the letter. The matter has been referred to the Bombay Government for a decision.
